title: Fragments in Time - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Doctors   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Modern Day
author: Bolin Shijiang   柏林石匠
description:
I have a bad memory. So I keep a diary.

This habit is good and bad. 
The good thing is that you can look through and amuse yourself later on for any trivial matters. 
The downside is that one day it will become a doctor’s bedtime reading…>
